conversations.body_text: Hi Eyvind Nødland,     We will send HS Pro out this week.

Any tracking number on this..?

Sendt fra min iPhone

You don't often get email from service@simsonn.com. Learn why this is important<https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>

We will send HS Pro out this week.

Hello,

Its soon been 30 days since my order and still no sign of it being shipped.

If it is not sent before this Friday 09.01.26

In case last mail did not get through my order number is:

#SSN4688

Med vennlig hilsen
